attributes.action: seek permission to dissolve Parliament and, in the spirit of Democracy, call a General Election so that the people of the United Kingdom can decide upon the policies which serve their needs the greatest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government waxes lyrical about how it feels the country supports it's actions on the economy, education, healthcare, defence, justice et al. It is time for the people to make their voices heard and exercise their democratic right to choose their Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
